creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photomechanical illustration of a car falling off a bridge and a ghostly figure, with text, printed in color offset lithography on wove paper covers; 36 pp.
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography; bound volume
title: ¡Que Suerte!: No Muerto, No Mort, No Death
